name: MariaDB DevContainer Template
postStartCommand: sudo chown -R vscode:vscode /workspace && sudo service mariadb start && sudo mariadb -e "CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS mydatabase; CREATE USER IF NOT EXISTS 'vscode'@'%' IDENTIFIED BY ''; GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON mydatabase.* TO 'vscode'@'%'; FLUSH PRIVILEGES;" && python3 .devcontainer/create_db.py && (cd /workspace && git rev-parse --is-inside-work-tree 2>/dev/null || git init) && git config --global --add safe.directory /workspace
